ProjectTemplate.Name: MvvmCross Core (Core only)
ProjectTemplate.Description:
MvvmCross Version: 4.4.0
A project template for a shared class library for use by an MvvmCross Android and/or iOS application.

ProjectTemplate.Name: MvvmCross Android App (Android only)
ProjectTemplate.Description:
MvvmCross Version: 4.4.0
A project template for a MvvmCross Android application. This template is dependent on the 'MvvmCross Core' project template (or similar).

ProjectTemplate.Name: MvvmCross App
ProjectTemplate.Description:
MvvmCross Version: 4.4.0
A multi-project template for a MvvmCross application for iOS and Android. Project includes an MvvmCross Android app, an MvvmCross iOS app, and an MvvmCross Core portable class library.

ProjectTemplate.Name: MvvmCross iOS App (iOS only)
ProjectTemplate.Description:
MvvmCross Version: 4.4.0
A project template for a MvvmCross iOS application. This template is dependent on the 'MvvmCross Core' project template (or similar).
